## Backup Slides: Technical Implementation {.appendix}

### ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á R Code ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• Formative Assessment

```{r}
#| eval: false
# ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• Exit Ticket ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ R
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)

# ‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• Exit Ticket
exit_ticket_data <- readr::read_csv("exit_tickets.csv") %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    understanding_level = dplyr::case_when(
      confidence_score >= 4 ~ "High",
      confidence_score >= 3 ~ "Medium", 
      TRUE ~ "Low"
    )
  )

# ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à
understanding_summary <- exit_ticket_data %>%
  dplyr::count(understanding_level, lesson_topic) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(lesson_topic) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(percentage = n / sum(n) * 100)

# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏î‡∏ä‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏π  
create_teacher_dashboard <- function(data) {
  data %>%
    dplyr::group_by(lesson_topic, understanding_level) %>%
    dplyr::summarise(count = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") %>%
    tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = understanding_level, 
                values_from = count, values_fill = 0) %>%
    gt::gt() %>%
    gt::tab_header(title = "Student Understanding Dashboard")
}

# ‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠
identify_at_risk <- function(data) {
  data %>%
    dplyr::filter(confidence_score <= 2 | 
           stringr::str_detect(confusion_area, "major|confused|don't understand")) %>%
    dplyr::select(student_id, lesson_topic, confidence_score, confusion_area)
}
```
